title: Understanding Mass Balance
text: A mass balance equation is crucial in equilibrium problems. It helps in accounting for all forms of a particular element or species in a solution.

title: Key Concept of Mass Balance
text: Think about how a mass balance equation ensures that the total amount of a substance remains constant, even if it changes form.

hintAnswer: Conservation of the total analytical concentration of a given element or species in all of its forms.
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes a mass balance equation in an equilibrium problem?
choices: Conservation of total charge in solution.
Conservation of the total analytical concentration of a given element or species in all of its forms.
The rate at which a reaction reaches equilibrium.
The conservation of volume in the solution.
